feed.title: Flood Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Flood: Release v4.8.5
entry.content:
release: 4.8.5 (#832)

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump http-proxy-middleware from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/816
  • fix(qBittorrent): Missing states by @LXGaming in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/817
  • i18n: new translations by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/821
  • ci: fix docker-dbg job by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/822
  • build(deps): bump cross-spawn from 7.0.3 to 7.0.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/823
  • fix(qBittorrent): API Version state handling by @LXGaming in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/826
  • fix(rTorrent): prevent extra commas in serialized XML by @kannibalox in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/830
  • fix(rTorrent): support xmlrpc int type by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/829
  • build: remove deprecated package frontmatter-markdown-loader by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/831
  • release: 4.8.5 by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/832

New Contributors

  • @kannibalox made their first contribution in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/830

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jesec/flood/compare/v4.8.4...v4.8.5

entry.title: New release for Flood: Release v4.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump nanoid from 3.3.7 to 3.3.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/833
  • Run compaction every dbclean interval by @CircuitCoder in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/834
  • Check if user services is bootstrapped before removing instances by @CircuitCoder in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/835
  • feat: add filter by filesystem location + bonus tooltip on overflowed filter names by @FinalDoom in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/518
  • Dark mode fixes by @FinalDoom in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/714

New Contributors

  • @CircuitCoder made their first contribution in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/834

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jesec/flood/compare/v4.8.5...v4.9.0

entry.title: New release for Flood: Release v4.9.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docs: add notes about upstream rtorrent json-rpc by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/845
  • i18n: new translations by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/848
  • ci: use bazel@7 to build deb by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/851
  • i18n: new translations by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/852
  • bump: 4.9.1 by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/853

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jesec/flood/compare/v4.9.0...v4.9.1

entry.title: New release for Flood: Release v4.9.2
entry.content:
fix debian deb files packaging

What's Changed

  • ci: upload deb with gh cli to avoid override by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/854
  • ci: always use version from package.json from ci by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/855
  • release: 4.9.2 by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/856

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jesec/flood/compare/v4.9.1...v4.9.2

entry.title: New release for Flood: Release v4.9.3
entry.content:
Upgrade deps to fix some potential security issues

What's Changed

  • docs: fix readme badge by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/857
  • build: upgrade deps by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/858
  • release: 4.9.3 by @trim21 in https://github.com/jesec/flood/pull/859

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jesec/flood/compare/v4.9.2...v4.9.3
